definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: Quick-drying nail polishmay save time, but at the expense of your nails.
sentences.chinese: 快干指甲油更方便，但会损害指甲。

sentences.english: Last year, the company said it was removing dibutyl phthalate .
sentences.chinese: 去年，该公司称要从指甲油中去掉邻苯二甲酸二丁酯。

sentences.english: All of a sudden there was nail enamel in these strange colors.
sentences.chinese: 她突然之间拥有很多新奇色彩的指甲油。

sentences.english: I like the pink-colored nail polish.
If you like, you may also apply powdered sparkles to your nail before the nail polish dries .
sentences.chinese: 如有需要，可在指甲油未干时贴上闪粉与闪片。

sentences.english: "With the nail polish there was something edgy or revolutionary, " she says.
sentences.chinese: 她说，“指甲油的那些命名是先锋性和革命性的。”

sentences.english: You could say that nail polish is preservative free!
sentences.chinese: 你可以说指甲油是一种免费的防腐剂。

sentences.english: Action must be fast when the nail polish coating, three coating finish.
sentences.chinese: 涂指甲油时动作一定要快，三笔涂完。

sentences.english: Up until that point, nail polish was only available in various shades of red.
sentences.chinese: 到那时为止，指甲油还只有深浅不同的红色而已。

sentences.english: You can also polish your toe nails according to the theme of the occasion and the summer time.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以根据夏天和场合的主题给脚趾甲擦上指甲油。

sentences.english: It’s found mostly in nail polish and hair dye.
sentences.chinese: 大多存在于指甲油和染发剂中。

sentences.english: Quick-drying nail polish may save time, but at the expense of your nails.
sentences.chinese: 快干指甲油更方便，但会损害指甲。

sentences.english: And once nail polish dries out there’s not much that can be done to save it.
sentences.chinese: 如果一瓶指甲油干掉了，那你也没必要去保存它了。

sentences.english: Alisa:I rub my cuticles every day. Also, I rarely wear nail polish.
sentences.chinese: 我每天都会揉指甲下缘的表皮，而且我很少擦指甲油。

sentences.english: They do their homework to find out which nail polishes are the most sought out.
sentences.chinese: 他们自己做功课去找到那些人们最想拥有的指甲油。
